root.name: Golf: U.S. Course
root.description: OverviewGolf: US Course is an FDS-only game never released outside of its native Japan and is another entry in the popular Nintendo sports franchise Golf. It deals exclusively with US golf courses. As with many of Nintendo's sports games, Mario is featured in the game as Player 1's character. Player 2 is represented by Luigi.Golf: US Course's disk is blue, rather than the usual yellow. Also, like its earlier counterpart Golf: Japan Course, there exists a gold variant that was only given away as a prize in a competition. This special version contains additional courses not found on the original disk and is highly sought after by collectors.
